citations.narrative:
The facility did not submit their Fiscal Year (FY) 2024 Annual Report to the Deputy Administrator on or before December
1 of the indicated calendar year as required per this Section of the Regulations. The facility’s FY 2024 Annual Report was
submitted to the USDA on December 10, 2024.
Research facilities are required to submit an annual report that covers the previous federal fiscal year to the USDA on or
before December 1 of each calendar year. The purpose of the annual report is to show the use or intention of use of live
animals in research, tests, experiments, or for teaching.
Correct from April 1, 2025, forward for all future annual report submissions.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the IACUC chairperson.
n

narrative:
2.36(a) 
   
Annual report. 
The facility did not submit their Fiscal Year (FY) 2024 Annual Report to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 
1 of the indicated calendar year as required per this Section of the Regulations. The facility’s FY 2024 Annual Report was 
submitted to the USDA on December 10, 2024. 
 
Research facilities are required to submit an annual report that covers the previous federal fiscal year to the USDA on or 
before December 1 of each calendar year. The purpose of the annual report is to show the use or intention of use of live 
animals in research, tests, experiments, or for teaching.  
 
Correct from April 1, 2025, forward for all future annual report submissions. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the IACUC chairperson.
